pe6:1.1_0: Buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ sāsanaṁ tividhena saṅgahaṁ gacchati, khandhesu dhātūsu āyatanesu ca.
pe6:1.3_0: Dasa rūpaāyatanāni cakkhu rūpā ca yāva kāyo phoṭṭhabbā ca, ayaṁ rūpakkhandho.
pe6:1.4_0: Tattha cha vedanākāyā vedanākkhandho cakkhusamphassajā vedanā yāva manosamphassajā vedanā,
pe6:1.5_1: rūpasaññā yāva dhammasaññā ime cha saññākāyā,
pe6:1.6_1: rūpasañcetanā yāva dhammasañcetanā ime cha cetanākāyā,
pe6:1.7_1: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ yāva manoviññāṇaṁ ime cha viññāṇakāyā,
pe6:2.2_0: Aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ saññā anattāti esā etesaṁ pariññā.
pe6:2.4_0: Samūhattho khandhattho, puñjattho khandhattho, rāsattho khandhattho.
pe6:2.5_0: Taṁ yathā dabbakkhandho vanakkhandho dārukkhandho aggikkhandho udakakkhandho vāyukkhandho iti evaṁ khandhesu sabbasaṅgahova evaṁ khandhattho.
pe6:3.4_0: Tāsaṁ pariññā aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ saññā anattāti esā etāsaṁ pariññā.
pe6:3.8_0: Evaṁ pañcasu dhātūsu puna rāgavavacchedattho dhātuattho.
pe6:3.10_0: Evaṁ pañcasu punarāha ekantipakatyatthena dhātuatthoti vuccate.
pe6:3.11_1: pakatiyā ayaṁ puriso pittiko semhiko vātiko sannipātikoti evaṁ pakaticakkhudhātu dasannaṁ piyā ca sabbesu indriyesu …pe…
pe6:4.3_0: Cakkhāyatanaṁ yāva manāyatananti ajjhattikaṁ, rūpāyatanaṁ yāva dhammāyatananti bāhiraṁ.
pe6:4.6_0: Aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ saññā anattāti, esā etesaṁ pariññā.
pe6:4.7_0: Api ca dvidhā pariññā ñātapariññā ca pahānapariññā ca.
pe6:4.8_0: Tattha ñātapariññā nāma aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ saññā anattāti, esā ñātapariññā.
pe6:4.12_0: Yathā suvaṇṇākaro dubbaṇṇākaro, yathā dvīhi tehi ākārehi te te gāvā uttiṭṭhanti.
pe6:4.13_0: Evaṁ ete hi cittacetasikā gāvā uttiṭṭhanti kammakilesā dukkhadhammā ca.
pe6:4.15_0: Yathā rañño āyadānehi āyo bhavati, evaṁ āyadānattho āyatanattho.
pe6:5.1_0: Cattāri ariyasaccāni dukkhaṁ samudayo nirodho maggo ca.
pe6:5.2_1: samudayo samāsena avijjā ca taṇhā ca,
pe6:5.2_2: nirodho samāsena vijjā ca vimutti ca,
pe6:5.2_3: maggo samāsena samatho ca vipassanā ca.
pe6:6.2_0: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā yāva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, evamete sattatiṁsa bodhipakkhikā dhammā.
pe6:6.3_0: Ye dhammā atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ paccekabuddhānaṁ sāvakānaṁ ca nibbānāya saṁvattantīti,
pe6:6.12_0: anavapariyattho balattho, thāmattho balattho, upādāyattho balattho, upatthambhanattho balattho.
pe6:7.5_0: Tattha aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti khandho sīlakkhandho ca samādhikkhandho ca paññākkhandho ca.
pe6:7.6_0: Tattha yā ca sammāvācā yo ca sammākammanto yo ca sammāājīvo, ayaṁ sīlakkhandho.
pe6:7.7_0: Yā ca sammāsati yo ca sammāvāyāmo yo ca sammāsamādhi, ayaṁ samādhikkhandho.
pe6:7.8_0: Yo ca sammāsaṅkappo yā ca sammādiṭṭhi, ayaṁ paññākkhandho.
pe6:8.1_0: Tattha yogāvacaro sīlakkhandhe ṭhito dosaṁ akusalaṁ na upādiyati,
pe6:8.2_0: Samādhikkhandhe ṭhito lobhaṁ akusalaṁ na upādiyati,
pe6:8.3_0: Paññākkhandhe ṭhito mohaṁ akusalaṁ na upādiyati,
pe6:8.4_0: Iti tīhi khandhehi tīṇi akusalamūlāni na upādiyati,
pe6:9.2_0: Yaṁ catūsu ariyasaccesu aññāṇanti vitthārena yathā so pāṇasajjesu kathaṅkathā kātabbaṁ.
pe6:9.4_0: Cha viññāṇakāyā vedanā saññā cetanā phasso manasikāro, idaṁ nāmaṁ.
pe6:9.7_0: Iti purimakañca nāmaṁ idañca rūpaṁ tadubhayaṁ nāmarūpanti vuccati.
pe6:9.8_1: cakkhu ajjhattikaṁ āyatanaṁ yāva mano ajjhattikaṁ āyatanaṁ.
pe6:9.9_0: Phassoti cha phassakāyā cakkhusamphasso yāva manosamphassoti phasso.
pe6:9.12_0: Upādānanti cattāri upādānāni kāmupādānaṁ diṭṭhupādānaṁ sīlabbatupādānaṁ attavādupādānanti upādānaṁ.
pe6:9.13_0: Bhavoti tayo bhavā kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo.
pe6:9.15_0: Yā paṭhamaṁ khandhānaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhātūnaṁ paṭhamaṁ āyatanānaṁ uppatti jāti sañjāti okkanti abhinibbatti khandhānaṁ pātubhāvo,
pe6:9.17_0: Jarā nāma yaṁ taṁ khaṇḍiccaṁ pāliccaṁ valittacatā pavivittaṁ catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ vivaṇṇataṁ bhaggo
pe6:9.17_1: taṁ jarā hīyanā pahīyanā āyuno hāni saṁhāni indriyānaṁ paribhedo upanāho paripāko,
pe6:9.19_0: Maraṇaṁ nāma yaṁ tasmiṁ tasmiṁ sattanikāye tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ cuti cavanatā maraṇaṁ kālaṅkiriyā uddhumātakānaṁ
pe6:9.20_0: Iti purimikā ca jarā idañca maraṇaṁ tadubhayaṁ jarāmaraṇaṁ.
pe6:10.1_0: Tattha andhakāratimisā yathābhūtaṁ appajānanalakkhaṇā avijjā saṅkhārānaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:10.4_0: Vatthu saviññattilakkhaṇaṁ viññāṇaṁ, taṁ nāmarūpassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:10.12_0: Khandhānaṁ pātubhāvalakkhaṇā jāti, sā jarāya padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:11.1_0: Nava padāni yattha sabbo akusalapakkho saṅgahaṁ samosaraṇaṁ gacchati.
pe6:11.3_0: Dve mūlakilesā, tīṇi akusalamūlāni, cattāro vipallāsā.
pe6:11.4_0: Tattha dve mūlakilesā avijjā ca bhavataṇhā ca, tīṇi akusalamūlāni lobho doso moho ca.
pe6:12.1_0: Tattha avijjā nāma catūsu ariyasaccesu yathābhūtaṁ aññāṇaṁ, ayaṁ avijjā.
pe6:12.2_0: Bhavataṇhā nāma yo bhavesu rāgo sārāgo icchā mucchā patthanā nandī ajjhosānaṁ apariccāgo,
pe6:13.2_0: Lobho nāma so tesu tesu paravatthūsu paradabbesu paraṭṭhānesu parasāpateyyesu parapariggahitesu lobho
pe6:13.2_1: lubbhanā icchā mucchā patthanā nandī ajjhosānaṁ apariccāgo,
pe6:13.4_0: Lobho lobhajassa akusalassa kāyakammassa vacīkammassa manokammassa ca,
pe6:13.4_1: tathā yathā taṁsampayuttānaṁ cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ mūlaṁ.
pe6:14.2_0: So sattesu āghāto akkhanti appaccayo byāpādo padoso anatthakāmatā cetaso paṭighāto,
pe6:15.2_0: Dosajassa kāyakammassa vacīkammassa manokammassa sampayuttānañca cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ mūlaṁ.
pe6:16.2_0: Yaṁ catūsu ariyasaccesu anabhisamayo asampajjaggāho appaṭivedho moho muyhanā sammoho sammuyhanā avijjā
pe6:16.2_1: tamo andhakāro āvaraṇaṁ nīvaraṇaṁ chadanaṁ acchadanaṁ apasacchāgamanaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ,
pe6:17.2_0: Mohajassa akusalassa kāyakammassa vacīkammassa manokammassa ca taṁsampayuttakānañca cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ mūlaṁ.
pe6:18.3_0: Tattha eko vipallāso tīṇi vipallāsāni cattāri vipallāsavatthūni.
pe6:18.4_0: Katamo eko vipallāso ca, yena paṭipakkhena vipallāsitaṁ gaṇhāti?
pe6:18.5_0: “Anicce niccan”ti, “dukkhe sukhan”ti, “anattani attā”ti, “asubhe subhan”ti, ayaṁ eko vipallāso.
pe6:21.1_0: Tattha manāpike vatthumhi indriyavatthe vaṇṇāyatane vā yo nimittassa uggāho, ayaṁ saññāvipallāso.
pe6:21.2_0: Tattha viparītacittassa vatthumhi sati viññatti, ayaṁ cittavipallāso.
pe6:21.3_0: Tattha viparītacittassa tamhi rūpe “asubhe subhan”ti yā khanti ruci upekkhanā nicchayo diṭṭhi nidassanaṁ santīraṇā,
pe6:21.4_0: Tattha vatthubhedena kāyesu dvādasa vipallāsā bhavanti.
pe6:21.5_0: Tayo kāye tayo vedanāya tayo citte tayo dhamme,
pe6:21.5_1: cattāro saññāvipallāsā cattāro cittavipallāsā cattāro diṭṭhivipallāsā,
pe6:21.5_2: āyatanūpacayato cakkhuviññāṇasaññāsamaṅgissa rūpesu dvādasa vipallāsā yāva mano saññāsamaṅgissa,
pe6:21.5_3: dhammesu dvādasa vipallāsā cha dvādasakā cattāri vipallāsā bhavanti.
pe6:21.6_0: Ārammaṇanānattato hi aparimitasaṅkheyyānaṁ sattānaṁ aparimitamasaṅkheyyā vipallāsā bhavanti hīnukkaṭṭhamajjhimatāya.
pe6:22.4_0: Yo saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca, te dhammā attabhāvavatthu.
pe6:22.12_0: Tattha catunnaṁ vipallāsānaṁ samugghātanatthaṁ bhagavā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne deseti paññapeti kāye kāyānupassī viharato “asubhe subhan”ti.
pe6:22.13_0: Vipallāsaṁ samugghāteti, evaṁ vedanāsu, citte, dhammesu ca kātabbaṁ.
pe6:23.1_0: Tattha andhakāratimisā appaṭivedhalakkhaṇā avijjā, tassā vipallāsapadaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:23.4_0: Idha vivādalakkhaṇo doso, tassa pāṇātipāto padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:23.6_0: Saṅkhatānaṁ dhammānaṁ avināsaggahaṇalakkhaṇā niccasaññā, tassā sabbasaṅkhārā padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:23.8_0: Dhammesu upagamanalakkhaṇā attasaññā, tassā ahaṅkāro padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:23.10_0: Etehi navahi padehi uddiṭṭhehi sabbo akusalapakkho niddiṭṭho bhavati,
pe6:23.10_1: so ca kho bahussutena sakkā jānituṁ no appassutena,
pe6:24.1_0: Nava padāni kusalāni yattha sabbo kusalapakkho saṅgaho samosaraṇaṁ gacchanti.
pe6:24.3_0: Samatho vipassanā alobho adoso amoho aniccasaññā dukkhasaññā anattasaññā asubhasaññā ca.
pe6:25.2_0: Yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti ṭhānaṁ paṭṭhānaṁ upaṭṭhānaṁ samādhi samādhānaṁ avikkhepo avippaṭisāro vūpasamo mānaso ekaggaṁ cittassa,
pe6:26.2_0: Khandhesu vā dhātūsu vā āyatanesu vā nāmarūpesu vā paṭiccasamuppādesu vā paṭiccasamuppannesu vā dhammesu
pe6:26.2_1: dukkhesu vā samudayesu vā nirodhe vā magge vā kusalākusalesu vā dhammesu sāvajjaanavajjesu vā kaṇhasukkesu
pe6:26.2_2: vā sevitabbaasevitabbesu vā so yathābhūtaṁ vicayo pavicayo vīmaṁsā paravīmaṁsā gāhanā aggāhanā pariggāhanā
pe6:26.2_3: cittena paricitanā tulanā upaparikkhā ñāṇaṁ vijjā vā cakkhu buddhi medhā paññā obhāso āloko ābhā pabhā
pe6:26.3_0: Tenesā vipassanā iti vuccati vividhā vā esā vipassanāti, tasmā esā vipassanāti vuccati.
pe6:26.4_0: Dvidhā cesā hi vipassanā dhammavipassanāti vuccati,
pe6:26.4_1: dvidhā imāya passati subhañca asubhañca kaṇhañca sukkañca sevitabbañca asevitabbañca kammañca vipākañca
pe6:26.4_2: bandhañca vimokkhañca ācayañca apacayañca pavattiñca nivattiñca saṅkilesañca vodānañca,
pe6:26.5_0: Atha vā viiti upasaggo passanāti attho tasmā vipassanāti vuccate, ayaṁ vipassanā.
pe6:27.1_0: Tattha dve rogā sattānaṁ avijjā ca bhavataṇhā ca,
pe6:27.1_1: etesaṁ dvinnaṁ rogānaṁ nighātāya bhagavatā dve bhesajjāni vuttāni samatho ca vipassanā ca.
pe6:27.2_0: Imāni dve bhesajjāni paṭisevento dve aroge sacchikaroti rāgavirāgaṁ cetovimuttiṁ avijjāvirāgañca paññāvimuttiṁ.
pe6:27.3_0: Tattha taṇhārogassa samatho bhesajjaṁ, rāgavirāgā cetovimutti arogaṁ.
pe6:27.5_2: dve dhammā pahātabbā avijjā ca bhavataṇhā ca,
pe6:27.5_3: dve dhammā bhāvetabbā samatho ca vipassanā ca,
pe6:27.5_4: dve dhammā sacchikātabbā vijjā ca vimutti cā”ti.
pe6:27.7_0: Yadā bhikkhuno dve dhammā pariññātā bhavanti nāmañca rūpañca,
pe6:27.7_1: tathāssa dve dhammā pahīnā bhavanti avijjā ca bhavataṇhā ca.
pe6:27.8_0: Dve dhammā bhāvitā bhavanti samatho ca vipassanā ca,
pe6:27.8_1: dve dhammā sacchikātabbā bhavanti vijjā ca vimutti ca.
pe6:27.11_0: Tassa āyupariyādānā jīvitindriyassa uparodhā idañca dukkhaṁ nirujjhati,
pe6:27.12_0: Tattha yo imesaṁ khandhānaṁ dhātuāyatanānaṁ nirodho vūpasamo aññesañca khandhadhātuāyatanānaṁ appaṭisandhi apātubhāvo,
pe6:28.2_0: Yaṁdhātuko alobho alubbhanā alubbhitattaṁ anicchā apatthanā akantā anajjhosānaṁ.
pe6:28.5_0: Alobhajassa kusalassa kāyakammassa vacīkammassa manokammassa taṁsampayuttānañca cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ mūlaṁ.
pe6:28.6_0: Atha vā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo kusalanti vuccati, so tiṇṇaṁ maggaṅgānaṁ mūlaṁ.
pe6:28.7_1: sammāsaṅkappassa sammāvāyāmassa sammāsamādhissa ca imesaṁ mūlanti,
pe6:29.2_0: Yā sattesu vā saṅkhāresu vā anaghāto appaṭighāto abyāpatti abyāpādo adoso mettā mettāyanā atthakāmatā hitakāmatā cetaso pasādo,
pe6:29.4_0: Adosajassa kusalassa kāyakammassa vacīkammassa manokammassa taṁsampayuttānañca cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ mūlaṁ.
pe6:29.7_0: Sammāvācāya sammākammantassa sammāājīvassa ca imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ maggaṅgānaṁ mūlaṁ,
pe6:30.2_0: Yaṁ catūsu ariyasaccesu yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ abhisamayo sammā ca paccāgamo paṭivedho amoho asammuyhanā
pe6:30.2_1: asammoho vijjāpakāso āloko anāvaraṇaṁ sekkhānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ,
pe6:30.4_0: Amohajassa kusalassa kāyakammassa vacīkammassa manokammassa taṁsampayuttānañca cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ mūlaṁ.
pe6:30.5_0: Atha vā dvinnaṁ maggaṅgānaṁ etaṁ mūlaṁ.
pe6:30.7_0: Sammādiṭṭhiyā ca sammāsatiyā ca imesaṁ dvinnaṁ maggaṅgānaṁ mūlaṁ, tasmā kusalamūlanti vuccati.
pe6:31.1_0: Evaṁ imesaṁ tīhi kusalamūlehi aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo yojetabbo.
pe6:32.2_0: “Sabbe saṅkhārā uppādavayadhammino”ti ca yā saññā sañjānanā vavatthapanā uggāho, ayaṁ aniccasaññā.
pe6:32.4_0: Aniccasaññāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu cittaṁ nānusandhati na sandhati na saṇṭhahati,
pe6:33.2_0: “Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti yā saññā sañjānanā vavatthapanā uggāho, ayaṁ dukkhasaññā.
pe6:33.4_0: Dukkhasaññāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya ālasse sampamāde vimhaye ca cittaṁ nānusandhati na sandhati na saṇṭhahati,
pe6:34.2_0: “Sabbesu dhammesu anattā”ti yā saññā sañjānanā vavatthapanā uggāho, ayaṁ anattasaññā.
pe6:34.3_1: anattasaññāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya ahaṅkāro cittaṁ nānusandhati na sandhati,
pe6:35.2_0: “Satta saṅkhārā asubhā”ti yā saññā sañjānanā vavatthapanā uggāho, ayaṁ asubhasaññā.
pe6:35.4_0: Asubhasaññāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya subhanimitte cittaṁ nānusandhati na sandhati na saṇṭhahati,
pe6:36.1_0: Tattha pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ pariññā bhagavatā desitā,
pe6:37.2_0: Sabbadhammaṁ yathābhūtaṁ paṭivedhalakkhaṇā vipassanā, tassā sabbaneyyaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:37.3_0: Icchāpaṭisaṁharaṇalakkhaṇo alobho, tassa adinnādānā veramaṇī padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:37.4_0: Abyāpādalakkhaṇo adoso, tassa pāṇātipātā veramaṇī padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:37.6_0: Saṅkhatānaṁ dhammānaṁ vināsaggahaṇalakkhaṇā aniccasaññā, tassā udayabbayo padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:37.10_0: Imesu navasu padesu upadiṭṭhesu sabbo kusalapakkho upadiṭṭho bhavati,
pe6:37.10_1: so ca bahussutena sakkā jānituṁ no appassutena,
pe6:38.1_0: Tattha niccasaññādhimuttassa aparāparaṁ cittaṁ paṇāmento satimapaccavekkhato aniccasaññā na upaṭṭhāti,
pe6:38.1_1: pañcasu kāmaguṇesu sukhassādādhimuttassa iriyāpathassa agatimapaccavekkhato dukkhasaññā na upaṭṭhāti,
pe6:38.1_3: vaṇṇasaṇṭhānābhiratassa kāye subhādhimuttassa ca vippaṭicchannā asubhasaññā na upaṭṭhāti.
pe6:40.3_0: Yathā vuttaṁ bhagavatā vīriyindriyaṁ, bhikkhave, kuhiṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, catūsu sammappadhānesu.
pe6:41.3_0: Yathā vuttaṁ bhagavatā satindriyaṁ bhikkhave, kuhiṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu.
pe6:42.1_0: Ekaggalakkhaṇo samādhi, avikkhepapaccupaṭṭhāno, tassa cattāri ñāṇāni padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:42.2_0: Yathā vuttaṁ bhagavatā samādhindriyaṁ, bhikkhave, kuhiṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, catūsu jhānesu.
pe6:43.1_0: Pajānanalakkhaṇā paññā, bhūtatthasantīraṇā paccupaṭṭhānā, tassa cattāri ariyasaccāni padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:43.2_0: Yathā vuttaṁ bhagavatā paññindriyaṁ, bhikkhave, kuhiṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, catūsu ariyasaccesu.
pe6:44.2_0: Tattha ariyasannissayalakkhaṇo patirūpadesavāso, so sappurisūpanissayassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:45.3_0: Tattha veramaṇilakkhaṇaṁ sīlaṁ, taṁ avippaṭisārassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:45.4_0: Na attānuvādalakkhaṇo avippaṭisāro, so pāmojjassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:45.12_0: Akusaladhammavivekalakkhaṇā vimutti, sā vimuttino vodānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe6:46.2_0: Tattha yo yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, esā dassanabhūmi.
pe6:46.3_0: Sotāpattiphalañca so yathābhūtaṁ pajānitvā nibbindati, idaṁ tanukāmarāgassa padaṭṭhānaṁ byāpādānaṁ.
pe6:46.4_0: Sakadāgāmiphalañca saṇhaṁ virajjati, ayaṁ rāgavirāgā cetovimutti.
pe6:46.5_0: Anāgāmiphalañca yaṁ avijjāvirāgā vimuccati, ayaṁ katābhūmi.
pe6:46.8_0: Brahmaññaariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, tassa tāni phalānīti brahmaññaphalānīti vuccante.
pe6:47.2_0: Saha saccābhisamayā ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṁyojanāni pahīyanti sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso ca,
pe6:47.2_1: imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānā parikkhayā ariyasāvako hoti sotāpanno avinipātadhammo yāva dukkhassantaṁ karoti.
pe6:48.2_0: Assutavā bālo puthujjano yāva ariyadhamme akovido,
pe6:48.2_1: so rūpaṁ attato samanupassati yāva viññāṇasmiṁ attānaṁ,
pe6:48.2_2: so imesu pañcasu khandhesu attaggāho vā attaniyaggāho vā esohamasmi ekasmiṁ vasavattiko pakkhitto anuggaho anusayanto aṅgamaṅganti parati.
pe6:48.3_0: Yā tathābhūtassa khanti ruci pekkhanā ākāraparivitakko diṭṭhinijjhāyanā abhippasannā,
pe6:49.6_0: Iti ucchedasassatappahānā ariyasāvakassa na kiñci diṭṭhigataṁ bhavati,
pe6:49.8_2: yāva ariyadhammesu kovido rūpaṁ anattato samanupassati,
pe6:50.2_0: Idha ariyasāvako buddhe na kaṅkhati, na vicikicchati abhippasīdati, itipi so bhagavāti sabbaṁ.
pe6:50.3_0: Dhamme na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati sabbaṁ.
pe6:50.4_0: Yāva taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānanti, iminā dutiyena ākaṅkhiyena dhammena samannāgato hoti.
pe6:50.6_0: yāva pūjā devānañca manussānañcāti, iminā tatiyena ākaṅkhiyena dhammena samannāgato hoti.
pe6:51.1_0: Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhāti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati abhippasīdati.
pe6:51.2_0: Taṇhā dukkhasamudayoti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati.
pe6:51.3_0: Taṇhānirodhā dukkhanirodhoti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati.
pe6:51.4_0: Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati abhippasīdati.
pe6:51.5_0: Yāva buddhe vā dhamme vā saṅghe vā dukkhe vā samudaye vā nirodhe vā magge vā kaṅkhāyanā vimati vicikicchā
pe6:51.5_1: dvedhāpathā āsappanā parisappanā anavaṭṭhānaṁ adhiṭṭhāgamanaṁ anekaṁso anekaṁsikatā,
pe6:51.5_2: te tassa pahīnā bhavanti paṇunnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
pe6:52.3_0: Tattha sīlassa sīlabbataparāmāso imināhaṁ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi
pe6:52.3_1: devaññataro vā tattha kapotapādāhi accharāhi saddhiṁ kīḷissāmi ramissāmi paricarissāmīti.
pe6:52.4_0: Yathābhūtadassananti rucivimutti rāgo rāgaparivattakā diṭṭhirūpanā passanā asantussitassa sīlabbataparāmāso.
pe6:52.7_0: Tadubhayaṁ sīlavataṁ parāmasati tadubhayena sīlavatena sujjhanti muccanti nīyanti,
pe6:52.7_4: anupāpuṇantīti avisucikaraṁ dhammaṁ avimuttikaraṁ dhammaṁ visucito vimuttito paccāgacchantassa yā tathābhūtassa
pe6:52.7_5: khanti ruci mutti pekkhanā ākāraparivitakko diṭṭhinijjhāyanā passanā,
pe6:52.8_0: Ete ubho parāmāsā ariyasāvakassa pahīnā bhavanti yāva āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā,
pe6:52.8_1: so sīlavā bhavati ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato akkhaṇḍehi yāva upasamasaṁvattanikehi.
pe6:52.9_0: Imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānā sutavā ariyasāvako bhavati sotāpanno avinipātadhammo, sabbaṁ.
pe6:53.2_0: Cattāro abhisamayā, pariññābhisamayo pahānābhisamayo sacchikiriyābhisamayo bhāvanābhisamayo.
pe6:54.5_0: Ārammaṇe cittaṁ upanibandhetvā pañcakkhandhe dukkhato passati.
pe6:54.8_0: Pañcakkhandhe dukkhāti passato yo pañcakkhandhesu ālayo nikanti upagamanaṁ ajjhosānā icchā mucchā paṇidhi patthanā pahīyati.
pe6:54.10_0: Yo tattha ālayo nikanti upagamanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ icchā mucchā paṇidhi patthanā, ayaṁ samudayo.
pe6:54.11_1: so nirodho samatho vipassanā ca maggo,
pe6:54.11_2: evaṁ tesaṁ catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ ekakāle ekakkhaṇe ekacitte apubbaṁ acarimaṁ abhisamayo bhavati.
pe6:54.12_0: Tenāha bhagavā “sahasaccābhisamayā ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṁyojanāni pahīyantī”ti.
pe6:55.1_0: Tattha samathavipassanā yuganaddhā vattamānā ekakāle ekakkhaṇe ekacitte cattāri kiccāni karoti,
pe6:55.4_0: Evaṁ diṭṭhanto yathā nāvā jalaṁ gacchantī cattāri kiccāni karoti,
pe6:55.5_0: evameva samathavipassanā yuganaddhā vattamānā ekakāle ekakkhaṇe ekacitte cattāri kiccāni karoti,
pe6:55.6_0: Yathā vā sūriyo udayanto ekakāle apubbaṁ acarimaṁ cattāri kiccāni karoti,
pe6:55.8_0: yathā padīpo jalanto ekakāle apubbaṁ acarimaṁ cattāri kiccāni karoti,
pe6:56.1_0: Yadā ariyasāvako sotāpanno bhavati avinipātadhammo niyato yāva dukkhassantaṁ karoti,
pe6:56.2_0: Sotāpattiphalañca sotāpattiphale ṭhito uttari samathavipassanaṁ bhāvento yuganaddhā vattamānā kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ yebhuyyena pahānā ariyasāvako hoti.
pe6:56.3_0: Sakadāgāmi pariniṭṭhitattā sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti, ayaṁ tanubhūmi.
pe6:57.1_0: Sakadāgāmiphalañca yo sakadāgāmiphale ṭhito vipassanaṁ bhāvento kāmarāgabyāpāde sānusaye anavasesaṁ pajahati,
pe6:57.1_1: kāmarāgabyāpādesu anavasesaṁ pahīnesu pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni bhavanti sakkāyadiṭṭhi sīlabbataparāmāso
pe6:57.1_3: imesaṁ pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānā ariyasāvako hoti anāgāmī tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā,
pe6:58.1_0: Anāgāmiphalañca anāgāmiphale ṭhito uttari samathavipassanaṁ bhāvento pañca uddhambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni
pe6:58.2_0: Imesaṁ pañcannaṁ uddhambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānā ariyasāvako arahā bhavati,
pe6:59.2_0: Tassa āyukkhayā jīvitindriyāparodhā idañca dukkhaṁ nirujjhati, aññañca dukkhaṁ na uppajjati.
pe6:59.3_0: Yo imassa dukkhassa nirodho vūpasamo, aññassa ca apātubhāvo, ayaṁ anupādisesā nibbānadhātu.
pe6:60.2_0: Cattāri jhānāni catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo nirodhasamāpatti ca.
pe6:60.4_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehīti vitthārena kātabbāni.
pe6:60.6_0: Virāgino vata vattabbo, yāva nirodhasamāpatti vitthārena kātabbā.
pe6:61.8_0: Yo pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgo pemaṁ nikanti ajjhosānaṁ icchā mucchā patthanā apariccāgo anusayo pariyuṭṭhānaṁ,
pe6:61.11_0: yathā dose tathā nioṭṭhānā, ayaṁ byāpādo nīvaraṇaṁ.
pe6:61.13_0: Yā cittassa jaḷatā cittassa garuttaṁ cittassa akammaniyatā cittassa nikkhepo niddāyanā pacalikatā pacalāyanā pacalāyanaṁ,
pe6:61.15_0: Yā kāyassa thinatā jaḷatā kāyassa garuttā kāyassa appassaddhi, idaṁ thinaṁ.
pe6:61.16_0: Iti idañca thinaṁ purimakañca middhaṁ tadubhayaṁ thinamiddhanīvaraṇanti vuccati.
pe6:61.20_0: Yo cetaso vilekho alañcanā vilañcanā hadayalekho vippaṭisāro, idaṁ kukkuccaṁ.
pe6:61.21_0: Iti idañca kukkuccaṁ purimakañca uddhaccaṁ tadubhayaṁ uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇanti vuccati.
pe6:61.23_0: Yo buddhe vā dhamme vā saṅghe vā …pe…
pe6:61.25_0: Api ca kho pana pañca vicikicchāyo samanantarāyikā desantarāyikā samāpattantarāyikā maggantarāyikā saggantarāyikā,
pe6:62.1_0: Tattha nīvaraṇānīti ko vacanattho, kuto nivārayantīti?
pe6:64.4_0: Tattha kāmacchando uddhaccaṁ kukkuccañca dibbavihāraṁ nivārayati,
pe6:65.3_0: Imehi pañcahi aṅgehi vippayuttaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ.
pe6:66.2_0: Vitakkavicārehi pītiyā sukhena ca cittekaggatāya ca.
pe6:66.3_0: Imesaṁ pañcannaṁ aṅgānaṁ uppādapaṭilābhasamannāgamo sacchikiriyaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ paṭiladdhanti vuccati.
pe6:66.4_1: tena vuccate paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharatīti dibbena vihārena.
pe6:67.1_0: Tattha dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ caturaṅgasamannāgataṁ pītisukhena cittekaggatāya ajjhattaṁ sampasādanena
pe6:67.1_1: imāni cattāri aṅgāni uppādetvā sampādetvā viharati,
pe6:67.1_2: tena vuccati dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharatīti.
pe6:68.1_0: Tattha pañcaṅgasamannāgataṁ tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ satiyā sampajaññena sukhena cittekaggatāya upekkhāya
pe6:68.1_2: tena vuccati tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharatīti.
pe6:69.1_0: Tattha catutthaṁ jhānaṁ caturaṅgasamannāgataṁ upekkhāya satipārisuddhiyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya cittekaggatā ca,
pe6:69.2_0: Iti imesaṁ catunnaṁ aṅgānaṁ uppādo paṭilābho samannāgamo sacchikiriyā catutthaṁ jhānaṁ paṭiladdhanti vuccati.
pe6:69.3_0: Imāni cattāri jhānāni uppādetvā sampādetvā upasampajja viharati,
pe6:70.2_0: Pīḷanaṭṭho aniccaṭṭho pabhaṅgaṭṭho sampāpanaṭṭho vivekaṭṭho aniccaṭṭho, ayaṁ aniccaṭṭho.
pe6:71.2_0: Pīḷanaṭṭho dukkhaṭṭho sampīḷanaṭṭho saṁvegaṭṭho byādhinaṭṭho, ayaṁ dukkhaṭṭho.
pe6:72.2_0: Anupalitto suññaṭṭho, asambhajanaṭṭho gatapaṭṭho vivaṭṭaṭṭho, ayaṁ suññaṭṭho.
pe6:73.2_0: Anissariyaṭṭho anattaṭṭho, avasavattanaṭṭho, akāmakāriṭṭho parividaṭṭho, ayaṁ anattaṭṭhoti.
